name: GoldenDict
description: GoldenDict is a dictionary software with many file formats. It can search Wiki websites based on MediaWiki, such as Wikipedia and Wiktionary, and completely support formatting, colors, images and links. Other websites can also be used via modularized Url patterns.

en_US.description: GoldenDict is a dictionary software with many file formats. It can search Wiki websites based on MediaWiki, such as Wikipedia and Wiktionary, and completely support formatting, colors, images and links. Other websites can also be used via modularized Url patterns.
en_US.name: GoldenDict

zh_CN.description: GoldenDict是一款词典软件，支持多种词典文件格式。GoldenDict可以查询Wikipedia、Wiktionary 等基于 MediaWiki 的Wiki网站，格式化、颜色、图像、链接等支持一应俱全，且能够通过模板化URL模式来使用其他的在线词典网站。
zh_CN.name: GoldenDict
